name: MYTH Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family:Warm & Spicy.Scent Type:Warm & Sheer.Key Notes:Ambrette Seeds, Jasmine Petals, Musk.Fragrance Description:This is an unforgettably gorgeous yet subtle perfume inspired by clean sheets and a swath of sun-warmed skin. It contains notes of jasmine petals, pink lotus, and tiger orchid that delicately intertwine with clean white musk and warm white cedarwood. All Ellis Brooklyn perfumes are vegan and PETA-certified cruelty-free..About the Fragrance:The bestselling, award-winning Myth eau de parfum takes a page from the literary worldu2018s most enchanting myths. Itu2018s sure to charm all who will come your way.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Fragrance (Parfum), Water (Aqua/Eau), Citric Acid, Tetrahydroxypropyl Ethylene Diamine, Alpha-Isomethyl-ionone, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Salicylate, Cinnamyl Alcohol, Citral, Citronellol, Coumarin, Eugenol, Farnesol, Geraniol, Limonene, Linalool........The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: How To Use:.Spray on pulse points or on the body as desired. ..Recycling Instructions:.Bottle and outer cardboard box are 100% recyclable

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First Impressions: The Ellis Brooklyn Myth Eau de Parfum immediately catches the eye with its sleek, minimalist bottle design, reflecting the modern and elegant nature of the scent inside. The fragrance itself opens with a soft, clean aroma that feels both fresh and inviting. Scent Notes: u2022 Top Notes: Ambrette seeds and bergamot offer a fresh and slightly musky beginning. u2022 Heart Notes: Pink lotus and jasmine petals add a delicate floral touch, creating a beautifully balanced middle. u2022 Base Notes: Patchouli, white cedarwood, and musk form a warm, grounding finish that lingers pleasantly. Wearability: Myth is incredibly versatile, making it suitable for both day and night. Itu2019s perfect for casual outings as well as formal events, thanks to its understated yet captivating presence. The scent is not overpowering, making it ideal for close encounters without overwhelming those around you. Longevity and Sillage: The longevity of Myth is impressive, lasting throughout the day without the need for frequent reapplication. Its sillage is moderate, leaving a subtle trail that invites compliments without being intrusive. Overall Thoughts: Ellis Brooklyn Myth Eau de Parfum is a standout fragrance that embodies simplicity and elegance. Itu2019s perfect for those who appreciate a clean, fresh scent with a touch of floral and woody elements. This fragrance is a must-try for anyone looking to add a timeless and versatile perfume to their collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ellis Brooklyn Myth is a captivating fragrance that strikes a perfect balance between elegance and allure. The top notes of bergamot and cassis open with a fresh, invigorating burst that immediately draws you in. As the scent develops, the heart notes of tiger orchid and pink lotus add a beautifully exotic floral dimension, making it both sophisticated and unique. What I love most about Myth is its versatility. Itu2019s subtle enough for everyday wear yet has enough character to stand out during special occasions. The lasting power is decent, staying noticeable for several hours without being overpowering. The bottle design is also chic and modern, reflecting the perfumeu2019s contemporary appeal. While I adore the overall composition, I wish it lasted a bit longer on my skin. Nonetheless, Myth is a wonderful addition to any fragrance collection, offering a blend of freshness and depth that is hard to resist. Overall, Ellis Brooklyn Myth is a delightful scent that earns a solid four stars from me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got Myth as a rollerball sample and while at first I just liked it, I ended up wearing it every day and it's now my favorite everyday scent! As per the name, it's surprisingly hard to describe this scent, I had to come here to look at the actual notes. While it's very light, it's somehow still very complex. As someone who doesn't like floral or feminine scents, while I would describe this as on the feminine side, it's such a specific musky, mellow, sweet scent I really like it. Especially on the dry down, it becomes warm and a little spicy. Not heavy or cloying at all. It does have a slightly sour/marine/powder note that some people may not like, but for me it works so well. And maybe this is just me but it almost smells like.... leather? Like the smell of a real, soft leather jacket - a little musky yet sweet. My only complaint is there is barely any staying power, pleaaaase fix this! I am very glad their travel sizes are sprays rather than rollerballs, which always helps a little with staying power. I recommend sampling this in store and seeing how it wears on you. Took a few tries for me to get into it but I don't think I could live without it now!

I only wish this small size included a sprayer or a rollerball for application to make it easier to apply.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

Not too sweet or overpowering and still quite refreshing. I get compliments every time I wear this perfume. I enjoy it, itu2019s easy to layer it with other perfumes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving this scent from Ellis Brooklyn. First off, if you are looking for a travel size perfume this one is perfect to travel with. I love the aesthetic of the bottle, itu2019s miniature, but cute! This perfume scent is light and clean, which is something I look for when buying a perfume. It isnu2019t an overpowering scent. I think this would be a good starter perfume, especially for someone who likes florals, but wants something light and not overpowering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a perfume I find myself buying over and over again. I love the scent but I understand it's not for everyone. I think the best way to describe it is if a cologne was made for women.   It's not subtle, but I'm not either. I fell in love with it the second I put it on and every other time since then. I have a lot of perfumes, so I don't wear it everyday - but every time I put it on I consider throwing away the rest of my collection.   This is not for people looking for a light, airy scent. This scent demands attention and keeps it without much effort. I find it lasts all day, sometimes I'll still find it lingering on a jacket that I wore weeks ago. That being said, I do go nose blind to it sometimes so I might not notice it but other people definitely still do.   It's dramatic and captivating and I don't see a future where I don't own a bottle of this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin

I donu2019t really like perfumes that are slightly soapy or u2018youu2019re skin but betteru2019 If you like Blanche from Byredo or Bubble Bath from Maison Margiela, this would be a safe/toned down blind buy

I'm trying to get into perfume and this is the only one I've tried that I'm able to confidently wear every day without being hyper-aware of the scent all day.  It does start to fade by the end of the day but I'm a fan of milder scents so that's exactly what I'm looking for. I'll definitely be getting a larger size of this perfume.

And thankfully- it smells great! Definitely not for everyone, but it fits right in with my aesthetic. Trying Fawn next (it hasnu2019t arrived yet), and will likely be purchasing a full size of whichever one I prefer!

Itu2019s very light so if you like strong fragrances itu2019s not for you, but itu2019s a perfect non-offensive, elegant fragrance that could easily transition to be sexy for a night out. I really like it and definitely recommend it for those looking for a good everyday, work scent!

reviews.review_title: Ellis Brooklyn Myth Eau de Parfum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried Ellis Brooklyn Myth that I received as part of a Clean at Sephora Sampler set. This scent is a part of the Warm & Spicy Fragrance Family. Some of the most notable key notes are Ambrette Seeds, Jasmine Petals and Musk.  The more subtle notes are pink lotus, orchid and white cedarwood.  Like all of Ellis Brooklyn perfumes, Myth is also vegan and PETA-certified cruelty-free. This scent is long lasting.  Clean at Sephora one of the brands that is committed to formulating products without certain ingredients. Such ingredients that can be harmful to human health and the environment. With so many scents out there, Iu2019m not sure if I would buy this scent.

If you want to smell like a rich socialite who made her own money and has u201cBlair Waldorf trying to seduce Chuck Bassu201d vibes, this is the perfume for you. Itu2019s sexy, itu2019s fresh, it has a LIGHT and clean musk thatu2019s feminine but confident, and I literally canu2019t stop smelling my wrists. Iu2019m OBSESSED. So. Damn. Good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first ever perfume by this brand. I have always wanted to try them and now I have. This scent to me feels like I am outdoors. That fresh laundry great out door vibe. I like how fresh it makes me feel. Not too strong on the nose since I tend to shy away from the more potent perfumes on the market

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is a signature note from Ellis Brooklyn. It combines the sweet and the salt which has both floral and wood scent. It doesnu2019t last very long but I love the clean ingredients and lovely packaging of this perfume. I got it complimentary from Ellis Brooklyn.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This has such a beautiful warm, yet refreshing scent! Normally, I gravitate more towards woody, and fresh floral scents but I was surprised that I loved this warm scent! When scents are too warm, they give me a headache but I had no issue with this scent whatsoever, in fact, I found myself smelling my wrists every now and again because I wanted to smell the fragrance again and again. It smells so comforting, to me, its like burying yourself in a fluffy comforter fresh out of the dryer on a rainy day!! This is an incredible everyday scent if you're going for a boss b**** vibe, otherwise, if thats not what you're going for, its perfect for fall/winter and formal events :)

reviews.review_title: Blast from the past with a modern twist
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! The scent is reminds me of a more sophisticated version of the cult classic White Musk from The Body Shop - a staple back in my high school days. Not overpowering at all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Received a small sample of it. Not good for me. It smells like someone who hasnu2019t taken a shower for a week and is trying to cover their body smell with eau de perfume. Tried to wash it off didnu2019t work, took a shower still can smell it! Just not a right perfume for me. It lasts long thou!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells AMAZINGGG, so light and fresh and I get tons of compliments every time I wear it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells great, doesnu2019t last long at all. I purchased the body milk to layer with the perfume and still cannot get the projection or silage to my liking. I have to layer on top of raw Shea butter, then the body milk, then the perfume. Otherwise if I leave off the Shea butter, the scent is so faint itu2019s like Iu2019m wearing nothing.

reviews.review_title: Not as good as I'd hoped
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice but inconsistent smell that I first thought smelled like this perfume my NYC-dwelling cool aunt wore growing up & I always loved that perfume. It was something -rain.  The sample vial I recieved smelled just like that.  So I bought it for myself but the actual purchased travel-size spray smells different. I still don't hate it, I've even worn it a few times hoping to smell what I originally smelled in the first vial.  However I'm a woman who likes traditionally womanly perfume (sweeter?/sexier? (shrug)) as opposed to some who don't mind wearing what are perfumes that are more traditionally gender-neutral. And this is definitely what I'd call very gender neutral. But if you like it go for it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute favourite perfume. It has become my daily scentu2014it is clean, it is fresh. It has a very unique scent and I recommend everyone to try it.

reviews.review_title: Finally, a new classic fragrance for me!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am such a perfume snob - I don't believe in using lots of different perfumes.  I have always found my signature scent and used it so that it's part of me.  Unfortunately, so many times, over the years, these beautiful fragrances are discontinued by companies who seem to be out to torment me!!  Well, with no thanks to Guerlain and Bvlgari, I have now found a new signature scent that I absolutely adore!!  MYTH is just perfect for me.  I love this little travel spray, more so because it's easier on the budget than splurging on a big bottle.  This is a classic fragrance of the future.  Do NOT discontinue it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair
reviews.review_text: this perfume smells like you are freshly showered. its sweet but not too sweet, smells so CLEAN. i love to pair this with Burberry Her.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I want to submerge my entire body in a tub of Myth. It's a comfy-fresh smell. I wear it all the time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for any upper middle class married woman living in the suburbs. This is exactly what I want my middle aged aunt to smell like when I hug her, but itu2019s way too mature and overpowering for me (18F)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i love skin scents. and for a skin scent, iu2019m impressed. unlike some others, this actually does last on me for hours and i always get compliments. guys really seem to love it :) when i first spray it, itu2019s watery flowers and dries down to the prettiest, most delicate white musk. itu2019s one of my faves that i can wear year round!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent feels like a warm hug at home. I canu2019t describe how comforting it is. Itu2019s described as u201ca warm bathu201d and I can totally understand why they used that description. Itu2019s subtle yet so delightful. If you have ever smelled the fragrance by clean named skin, itu2019s a very similar warm homey feeling. The scents are not the same obviously but they gave me such a tender homey feeling. I typically love aquatic fresh scents but something about this one just feels so right. I agree with many of the other reviewers stating the staying power isnu2019t great, but Iu2019ve noticed if I spray two sprays on my wrists and a separate spray or two on my chest it lingers for hours. Also the shape and size makes it very easy to carry along with you during the day. This is my new top scent, Iu2019d say go to your local Sephora and try it out!

reviews.review_title: LOVE the Scent - Doesn't Last Long
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in LOVE with this scent. Tried it and knew I had to get it. But the scent just doesn't last very long. I even bought the Excellent Body Milk to layer, but it didn't help. Hard to give this more than three starts when Gucci is a little more, and lasts much longer - yes, I know: Gucci, LOL!

reviews.review_title: Calling it a skin scent is kind
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love fragrances and initially got this as part of a sample pack.  This scent stood out as my favorite.  The soft musk undertones with the white flowers (jasmine, but not a beastly jasmine) I thought would be great when I wanted something light.  Or, it would work well as a layering perfume. Decent sillage but it had great longevity.  I decided to buy a full bottle.  I have been wearing it for weeks now, on and off, and I have to say I'm seriously disappointed. From my very first spray, it smelled like an incredibly watered down version of the sample. I mean 3/4 water, 1/4 scent.  I've had to overspray just to smell ANYTHING.  I wanted to be sure I wasn't losing my mind so I sprayed the crook of my elbow with 3 sprays, waited about 10 minutes, and had my husband smell.  He said, What am I suppossed to smell. Yikes!  Seriously disappointing, especially considering the cost.  I should have returned but I haven't gone into a store/mall in quite some time. Sephora, I hope you look into this!

reviews.review_title: very fresh and clean- almost too much so
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Straight upu2014-smells exactly like soap or a nice hotelu2019s bed sheets. If you smell it after itu2019s warmed up it smells like fancy hotel bed sheeets but immediately out of the bottle it smells like bar soap with Chanel no. 5 on top. Idk how I feel about it yet. Itu2019s definitely very light so if youu2019re sensitive to fragrances you could wear this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never, ever written a review about anything before, but I just had to for this perfume! Such a great everyday perfume. I have a very sensitive nose and Iu2019ve noticed over the years most perfumes tend to bother me. But this one doesnu2019t at all. Sweeter smells have always been my thing. But as Iu2019ve been getting older, Iu2019ve been enjoying more of the clean smelling ones. I feel like this is sort of the perfect in between. Love thatu2019s itu2019s clean and for me the scent last forever. Honestly, if youu2019re thinking about buying it, just got for it! Or at least start with the travel size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m super picky when it comes to perfumes. Finding one I love that doesnu2019t give me a headache is almost impossible. Until this one! Itu2019s just perfect, if youu2019re on the fence just buy it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smelled amazing in Sephora and I bought it right away.  After wearing it however, I don't like it. It smells too soapy on my skin and almost like a man.  Like I just hugged my boyfriend and his cologne rubbed off on me. Will be returning

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely gorgeous scent. I spray this on myself as soon as I get out of the shower. Itu2019s clean and crisp. Four stars because no matter how much I spray or where- the scent lasts about 30-40 minutes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: the description it dead on with this. it's very clean smelling, but not just like detergent or soap (which i don't mind, but it's nice that it's different). on me, it smells like flowers after rain.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received a sample of this perfume and used it this morning- its lunch time and I am now on the Sephora app to purchase a bottle of it! It smells THAT good. It reminds me of something maybe the CLEAN line of perfume would make- it's very, well, clean smelling! Just has a fresh scent to it that is very much it's own. I sprayed some on me right out of the shower and it still smells amazing. Can't wait for my full size bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The moment i sprayed this perfume I knew I had smelled this scent before...ready for it...this perfume smells identical to the original Herbal Essence shampoo scent from the early 2000u2019s era. I love the scent itu2019s fresh and pretty and nostalgic for me. Very good lasting power...spray it before bed and you can smell it in the morning. Safe blind buy if you like soft floral fresh perfumes. I would recommend it solely based on that amazing dry down alone!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: At first when I sprayed this on a paper strip, I thought I liked it but once I actually wore it, it smells so much like menu2019s shaving cream or after shave. It gave me a headache unfortunately. I love Ellis Brooklyn and the whole aesthetic of the brand but I just donu2019t love this scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: There is something about this scent I absolutely love. I do understand how its not for everyone, though. When I was little, I had a babysitter from Germany that wore a perfume that I loved. She was in her 30's..classy and beautiful, but I never asked her what the perfume was. Fast forward to getting a sample of this perfume. The moment I smelled this, I immediately recognized the same notes in that perfume my babysitter wore, immediately took me back to good memories of my childhood and maybe the nostalgia is part of why I love this so much. It definitely smells unique, I do not notice many fragrances that remind me of this. I would always sample fragrances before blind buy. I dont wear this everyday, but definitely still love it..very soft, unique and feminine. Id say fits ladies best that are ages 25 and up, its definitely not a young teenager scent in my opinion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love but I donu2019t feel like it last long enough

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Scent fades after 20 minutes. It smelled amazing in the sample but this was a waste of money

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: On my skin, this lasted 4 or so hours. But the smell.. itu2019s not for me. It reminded me of the shampoo called Pert, less floral- more soapy. I think itu2019s an inoffensive scent, so it may be good for a work environment if you end up liking this perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this because I ran out of the sample. It had a nice smell. This is a big size to buy .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has become my absolute favourite scent. Itu2019s special but in a quiet way. Not a u2018room rockeru2019. Itu2019s classy and simple.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My husband bought me a bottle for Christmas after I picked it as a favorite in the EB library collection. Unfortunately, the scent doesn't last very long and it has started to break me out horribly wherever I spray it. Great scent, but not worth a rash.

reviews.review_title: Great scent to wear to work and lasts all day.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a free sample of this product and my first thought was that it smelled like something a mature woman would wear to her office job. It's a bit muskier than I tend to go for so I didn't like it at first, but it's grown on me. It's not like your mother's or grandmother's overtly musky perfumes. The musk is more gentle and there are fresh/floral undertones too. It's not a scent I would wear on a date, but I do wear it a lot when I'm working. It also lasts a long time. I can still smell it in my hair at the end of the day.  I do plan on buying a mini or full-size bottle of this when I get the chance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My signature fragrance. I hope they make it forever. Soooo good. mature without being too musky. I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My go tou2019s for a very long time were Gucci flora and English  Laundry. But Iu2019m single for the first time in years and I wanted something a little more sultry and sexy. But not too much because thatu2019s just not me. The sexy smell does not match me. Well let me tell you. This is perfect. Just enough sultry but still clean and fresh. Iu2019ve repurchased 3 times. I would get complimented with the other two but the compliments for this one are unmatched because the others would get complimented. But with this one sometimes people go in for one more sniff or I catch a last second longer sniff ALL the time. This is my holy grail. If youu2019re the type of person that perfume changes on your skin. Get this to spritz lightly on your clothing. The scent lasts for HOURS. And it is maybe a little strong for the 1st few mins. But most perfumes that last all day are really strong at first. I am just in love. If this ever gets discontinued I will max out my credit card.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very light floral with mild musk undertones. The effect is clean and fresh, not harsh or sweet. It's also not too strong--I tend to apply several sprays, and this didn't overwhelm. I keep buying the travel spray size so I can take it with me and freshen up because it doesn't seem to have great staying power. I love the scent, so I give it four stars and would make it five stars if it were a little more lasting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is strange. At first spray I hated it but after it wore down and reacted to my skin a bit I found it tolerable. It lasted a LONG time and by lunchtime I actually enjoyed it. I'm not sure I'll be purchasing since the beginning was really rough. But if you can get past that, it may be for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: When I first smelled this fragrance, I thought it may be for men. Its not, but could be worn unisex in my opinion. Like many others have said, it's very musky, but in a more modern way. I feel like a fancy old white woman who walks around in a fur-trimmed silk robe who has a dark secret when I wear this. I should also note I received a small sample before buying a bigger size, and the sample lasted a REALLY long time because this scent lasted awhile on my skin and was well concentrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite fragrance! It is heavy on the musk so if that is something you like then this is definitely for you. My favorite thing about this is that Iu2019ve found the scent to last a very long time on my skin, a full day! It lasts even longer on clothes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! My favorite everyday perfume to wear. I would recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I seriously love this perfume. I had been looking for a perfume for forever and nothing seemed just right until I got a sample of this perfume through a different order. It's musky and smells very sexy. My boyfriend loves it and so do I! I think it is my forever perfume. I highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this so much! I spray it after my warm shower and moisturizing before bed, I just wait a few minutes until my skin is dry. A comforting and sensual scent that compels husband to cuddle me all night. Wonderful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received a sample loved the smell bought the full size with in the next week revived many complements

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Initially loved this light, delicate, soft floral musk very much. The longer I've owned it, the less I've used it. I've simply become unattracted to the fragrance and moved on to others. Love that it's a vegan and cruelty free brand, though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this sample with an order and will be purchasing the full size! In general, I prefer scents that aren't powdery, sweet, or sharp. I am a sucker for jasmine in scents as well, so it's no surprise that I enjoyed Myth!  Myth reminds me of Bvlgari's Jasmin Noir. It has similar floral notes as Jasmin Noir, but gives a slightly more rounded/warm scent profile than Jasmin Noir. When I smell Myth, I feel sexy and comfortable/cozy. It's an everyday scent for me, whereas Jasmin Noir is more for a night out.  I'm excited to wear this throughout the chillier months!

reviews.review_title: If you like musk this is for you!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells good but kind of on the mature side... If youu2019re in your 30s this perfume is going to make you smell older than you look. But if you like musk this is for sure a win.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is everything! Clean and warm but so sexy. I wear it often and have gotten so many compliments! I wear it alone for casual days and layer it for special occasions. I love the clean look of the bottle and the magnetic cap.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you're into dark, sexy scents this stuff is great. Gives me Narcisco Rodriguez for Her vibes but a little more masculine which is right up my alley. I'm a perfume junkie and this is the first one in a long time that has me smelling myself constantly to put me in a good mood.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The smell of the perfume is not feminine enough to be a causal scent. It smells like a downgraded version of the cologne my grandfather wears. Not my cup of tea.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells like cheap menu2019s soap or cologne. Another reviewer mentioned Irish Springs soap and I would definitely liken it to that! Ellis Brooklyn has been a total miss for me...the only one of this brands fragrances that I have enjoyed is SWEET.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is divine! finally a scent that smells good and is VEGAN! No animal by products like musk (aka animal rear secretions) here! The scent on my skin is light, powdery, and clean. Another added bonus is that the cap is magnetic! Its the little details that make a scent feel more lux.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume makes me feel like a fancy lady sipping champagne on a yacht. It is light, fresh, floral, and complex in the best way. This fragrance has an interesting and delicious mix of delicate and warm notes at the same time. A new favorite!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: on the fence between 3 and 4 stars for this. it reminds me of a vial of perfume i found in my motheru2019s things when i was a kid. it smells very similar to verb ghost oil, only less pear fruit. my complaint is the same as i have for the ghost oil, and i think itu2019s the jasmine: a soapy smell i dislike. i prefer the smell of authentic star jasmine. perhaps it only smells soapy on me/to me (like the cilantro soap gene, tho i donu2019t have that). i do think it would be lovely for some. i definitely smell the amber, very sweet and resiny. doesnu2019t last long on me, which is strange because usually esp with sweet smells my chemistry keeps me smelling like an ihop for hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It smells amazing! but it doesn't stay for that long so maybe put on an unscented moisturizer then spray so it will stick to your skin longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It gives off a masculine smell out in the air but once it hit my skin and mixed with my ph it smells so so wonderful. Still giving off a hit of masculine smell but more of a unisex mixture. It feels so fresh and light but still strong. Definitely true to its description on having the lighter scents making the first impression followed along by the stronger ones

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try the sample of this due to all the great reviews, but when i got it i was disappointed by the scent! Im going to be brutally honest and say it smells like baby powder mixed with mens cologne. Its very flat and is reminiscent of the perfume my grandma used to use. For my personal taste its not suitable, but it may be suitable for others that prefer a musk/mature scent.

reviews.review_title: smells great but it's short lived
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells amazing! I dont find this floral AT ALL! It smells fresh like laundry but better. I wish it was stronger and longer lasting for the price. The smell disappears pretty quickly :( boo!

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume! It's so light. I find the reviews saying it smells like bathroom soap interesting because I have a sensitive nose and hated perfumes that smelled like cleaning products. Myth isn't like that at all for me.   Before this, I used Viktor & Rolf's Flowerbomb, D&G Light Blue, and Elizabeth and James' Black Nirvana. Those scents all have more unique/distinguishing features (Flowerbomb is spicy, Light Blue is citrus-y, etc). Myth is very neutral, which is what I like about it and why it has become my go to, while the others I will wear if I'm in a certain mood. Staying power is decent, but I think less than the other perfumes I mentioned.   Will buy again when I finish the bottle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t think itu2019s worth the price but it still smells good very easy to break lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an inoffensive, warm, pleasant, cosy floral. I like the soft amber and jasmine accord. It is long-lasting on my skin. Definitely an evening fragrance; the florals get slightly cloying as the fragrance develops on skin. I think it would smell very interesting on a man; men should wear more florals in my opinion and this clean, neutral-smelling white floral is a great place to start.
Smells like straight up soap ! Reminds me of Irish spring soap bars

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this sample in the Sephora Favorites perfume sampler, and thought from the description that it would be a gentle floral.  It smells overwhelmingly like a bar of soap.  A little bit of wood, a tiny bit of orchid.  The inspiration was bed linens/sheets, and that sounds about right -- laundry detergent.  It's not offensive, just that clean scents aren't my jam.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I recently got the chronicle set of samples, and this was the first one I tried. It's fresh and its crisp and I was smelling my wrist all day, and I can see why people like it. It's just not my style. But if you're looking for something fresh and memorable that people are sure to notice, Myth will give you that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a new but very big fan of the Ellis line. My browsing through their Library sampler was fun all around, and led to me buying full bottles of Myth and Fable. I love most fragrances, but I'm increasingly trying to go clean. I like many of the Phlur line, too, but they *tend* (except for Ameline) to go strangely sugary with my body chemistry. What I love about Myth is its subtle edge and the absolutely (to my nose) PERFECT cocktail of gentle floral, amber, musk, and woods. Really, nothing dominates. And if all clean fragrances can be a little fleeting -- this is a good thing, in a way, since it's testament to the fact that they don't contain creepy, clingy, stick-to-your-skin chemicals! -- I find at least with Ellis fragrances one extra spritz on clothes goes a long way toward extending the projection and keeping more of the composition of the fragrance in your general personal space for longer. Really lovely fragrance, with the good kind of nostalgia mixed into it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love Love Love this scent!!! Floral but with a special clean, yet rich undertone. I alternate between several scents, but since buying Myth I find myself going to it more often than any others.... fairly long lasting, have been complemented on scent. Go for it!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I first received this fragrance as a sample and I fell in love instantly. I find this scent to be very feminine and fresh smelling. It has a sort of flowery powder smell to me that has a subtle warmth as well.   It has actually become one of my fav scents to date, my only complaint would be the longevity; because its a subtle fragrance it doesn't really last that long but I find few fragrances last long on me.   If this came in an absolut version I would purchase instantly

reviews.review_title: wish i could give zero stars
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: reeked so bad my boyfriend and i had to light a candle. i literally scrubbed it off my arms. honestly the worst perfume iu2019ve smelled in awhile. donu2019t understand why it was so highly rated. i returned it the next day after it came in the mail

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the way it smells but I'm having a hard time putting it into words. I can see how it would be a unisex scent, it doesn't lean too far either way. It's subtle and interesting, not anything typical that I've experienced before. I picked it because the notes listed are ones that I tend to love. But I can't say it smells like the other scents that list the same ones, so it's def. different. Slightly powdery but very fresh with a bit of spice?

reviews.review_title: Turn a bad day into a good one!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So bright and fresh! It's my feel good parfum.  It has a floral top note but it isn't heavy with traditional flowers, it's more light and breezy with small blooms and wild flowers.  It does have other notes that give it an anchor -- seems like an amber maybe?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t know what it is about this scent but I am in love with it and Iu2019ve gotten compliments from it. A little goes a long way in my experience and itu2019s very long lasting (clothes and skin) but not too overbearing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I first got Myth as a sample and after wearing for a bit and receiving many compliments, I decided to purchase a full size bottle. I find this scent lasts all day, itu2019s fresh but has some floral body to it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never been loyal to a perfume, often bouncing around from whatever new scent I found and liked every few months. Since finding this scent, Iu2019ve worn it daily for a year and a half and love it just as much as day one. Itu2019s not too strong. Not too sweet. Itu2019s perfectly balanced and super wearable. Itu2019s clean, elegant, warm, and interesting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not sure what this takes me back to, but the nostalgia was real. I would describe myself as somewhat androgynous and this scent fits just right. Definitely not your typical floral scent. This might sound odd, but almost like a modern industrial scent? Think of that vibe and put it in a bottle. I think thatu2019s it.

reviews.review_title: Unique, lots of depth, LOVE IT SO MUCH
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I dislike many of the most popular fragrances, finding them cheap, cloying, overly sweet and all smelling the same with a very strong base note that makes me nauseous. Not this one!   It doesn't smell like any fragrance I've experienced before. It borders on masculine/woody on me, but there's just enough floral in there to keep it perfect without too sweet. Powdery does not describe it on me at all - it's complex and sophisticated. I can't smell it on myself after a couple of minutes, but when I wear it I get enthusiastic compliments when people hug me, so it's not crazy strong. Myth does linger on my hair and clothing, so I think I just acclimate to it. Also, it does not break my out in a rash, which most fragrances do.  I just love it. I went through the travel size and bought the full-size and I'm rationing it because I only like it more as I go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is a floral but rather than being a light, fresh floral it covers the middle ground with an intoxicating depth without losing its distinct floral elements. Neither heavy nor light this strikes a perfect balance with a sexy smoothness and enticing depth. Not overly floral and a little earthy/woody, this lands as a very complex and alluring fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Nice, clean, crisp scent. Makes me feel confident. I never worry about smelling overwhelming or cheap. Will purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My sheet freshener smells like this. I don't exactly want to smell the same.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like cheap men's cologne!! This is the reason why I no longer trust reviews here.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful scent. Iu2019ve been trying to get away from the heavy older fragrances Iu2019ve always worn & try some u201cclean and freshu201d scents and glad I did after getting a sample. So happy I did. Sephora, please start adding some samples of the newer scents out there!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I first got this as a sample and ended up getting the full size. The scent smells so clean! Itu2019s perfect for everyday use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When you first spray it, it smells like a more subdued 'White Musk' from The Body Shop. I've had it on for less than an hour, and I don't smell it anymore on me...  If you like musks, I guess it's an ok smell. I'm glad I only got the smallest version of it. I will not repurchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a lovely light musk scent. I don't know that I agree with reviewers who felt it was powdery I think it's more wood-y, at least on my skin. It's very light and despite floral elements I did not notice them, nor would I consider this a floral scent. It's almost masculine at some points. For me, this will be an excellent scent to give a depth to my usual florals. I like that the it stays close to your skin as well - a great way to make someone remember being close to you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the travel size blindly, and through reviews thought I would love it- but nowhere does it mention how strong of a powder smell it has.  I was soo excited for it, and I want to love it but I cannot handle powder. So if you are like me hopefully this helps! It also does not wear for very long, maybe a couple of hours

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My absolute favorite perfume! It smells so good! Itu2019s a sexy smell. You will not regret getting this!

reviews.review_title: A must try at least by sample once
reviews.review_text: Im a safe buyer.. I hate paying alot of money on stuff ive never tried..so I bought a sample deal with this one and I now have this size for my purse and at home. Ive been a Burberry gurl for many many years and now I'm a Ellis Brooklyn MYTH gurl...lol. I'm so happy with this scent and the price is perfect. I dont like wild and crazy scents.. If you like a sweet and tender scent that last all day... You'll love this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So in love with this scent!!! Itu2019s the perfect perfume for me. Clean & light floral scent .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Freaking LOVE this perfume!! I have to buy the mini because I can't afford the full size yet, but believe me when I say I will buy the full size bottle one day! It is worth the $100! It is such a beautiful fragrance. You have to add this to your collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample and I absolutely had to have it! The scent is amazing and not too floral. It is a truly unique scent. It manages to be sexy and sweet at the same time. Itu2019s earned a prominent place on my vanity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually wear YSL Mon Paris and wanted to branch out. The store associate pointed me to Myth and Iu2019m obsessed. Itu2019s light but not sweet or floral. I love this as an everyday perfume when I donu2019t need something as heavy as YSL or Chanel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Im very picky when it comes to my parfumes, i got this as a sample tested it and knew i had to get it. Saddly they dont sell it at the store anymore so I ordered it online at Sephora . I got so many compliments on this parfum deffinatly will repurches. The scent lasts me all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received this as a sample and will definitely be making it a staple. It smells so good! Fresh, light and feminine. Do not hesitate to try this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received it as a sample with another purchase but I absolutely loved it! Itu2019s long lasting and surprisingly strong (but not overwhelmingly strong)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love, love this light, feminine scent. Long lasting and wonderful. Only downside was I dropped the spray on my bathroom floor, and the glass shattered everywhere.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best scent, and is truly intoxicating. It manages to smell both fresh and sexy. As someone who is sensitive to scent, and can get headaches pretty easily, Myth never causes them. It lasts a super long time on my skin also. I have fallen asleep after wearing this for a whole day, and can still smell traces of it in the morning. It has quickly become my favorite!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this scent! Itu2019s unique but I do wish it lasted a little longer. Staying power is decent though

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this at a Sephora store. Love the scent, which makes its presence but isnu2019t cloying or overpowering. However as other reviewers noted, it doesnu2019t last long and I too found that the spray top isnu2019t securely attached to the bottle so have to be careful when removing the cap or the whole top will pull out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been looking for a new fragrance I can wear every day and this is it!  My go-to evening fragrances are Chanel COCO and Chanel COCO Mademoiselle Intense.  For years, my work/daytime fragrance has been Pure Grace.  I love it because it's a light, clean fragrance.  What I don't like about it is it wears off after about an hour.  Myth has a similar scent, but better!  It's got a freshly showered scent.   It's slightly musky, clean, and the scent lasts for hours!  I absolutely love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not worth the money at all.  Scent doesn't last.  Was very disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love the smell, but it doesnu2019t last. I keep purchasing it though because it doesnu2019t give me a migraine and the scent is amazing.

reviews.review_title: Favourite perfume I have ever tried!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Perfume usually smells awful on me. Iu2019ve been searching my whole life for scents that donu2019t smell like rotting fruit on my skin. Both myth and sci fi smell INCREDIBLE on me! And the scent lasts all day. My favourite perfume I have ever tried!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I agree with some other reviewers that itu2019s not a very strong scent. I agree it is more of a u201cskinu201d scent. I can smell it (it is getting weaker and weaker very soon) but it disappears. Although I like that part of scent that lingers so it actually works for me (I donu2019t like woodsy smells and I like that it wears out). Scent is very unique so I bought small size to have it available (I have few perfumes for different moods /occasions)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Myth smells clean, effortless, elegant, fragile, and light. It's powdery and watery at the same time, and reminds me of white flowers in morning dew. I do like the smell, but it's not a scent that I love. The scent does not last as long as I expected (maybe lasts 3 hours?) and it's not a really noticeable scent to begin with. It's a good perfume to use when you feel like you don't want to commit to wearing a perfume... if that makes sense. Nevertheless, it is a pleasant perfume and I do enjoy wearing it, especially for work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loveeee this fragrance. I am very picky when it comes to perfume and for years would only wear Gucci II (even after it was discontinued I would search high and low for it). I recently started transitioning over to u201ccleanu201d products after learning how toxic some commonly used ingredients are, and finding a clean fragrance has by far been the most challenging. This one is the first that hasnu2019t felt like a u201ccleanu201d fragrance (ie. smells like a high-end perfume opposed to an essential oil). I will say that the fragrance does wear off a bit quicker than I would like, but I just purchased the travel version to keep in my purse for a quick refresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unique scent and always get complemented when I spray a few spritzes on pulse points. Emits a vibrant smell throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is quite unique. To me, it smells like Coconut Lime Verbena from Bath and Body Works grew up and got a high paying job, and also lost the coconut. I like citrus scents, but most citrus perfume tend to focus on orange-like scents. This one is very lime to me. I can smell some white flowers in it, which I normally hate, but it is blended well with other scents and it keeps it from being cloying like most white flower notes. And thankfully it is not powdery at all (I hate powdery notes). I normally go for young scents over mature ones, but I can't place this scent in either category. it's kind of ageless. I can see how some people may not like it, as it is very different, but I like it. Staying power is decent and I think the fade-down smells even better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am always getting fragrance samples and honestly Iu2019m not picky when it comes to fragrances so I live off those samples. When I got this sample I knew as soon as I put it on that I wanted a full size bottle.   At first I thought it was a males cologne but after I sprayed it and rubbed it in I realized it was just a musty perfume. If you like sweet musky smells, this is probably the one for you. The perfume is strong with means 1-2 sprays and youu2019re done which is amazing.   Gave it four stars because the price seems a little elevated, may have convince someone to get me this as a gift haha.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells great but doesn't last long. It's multi layered.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A clean scent, I would wear this every day. Chic and classy. Would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First tried this as a sample and immediately fell in love. I saw someone say the scent doesnu2019t last,  but I hope they know that itu2019s harder to smell scents off yourself than it is for others to smell it off you. If anything Iu2019ve found it hard to get the scent out! But I donu2019t mind. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I usually dislike malt perfume because of the chemically initial scent. This brand of perfume never has this problem. This scent is lovely and floral with a hint of musk to it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this but I hated it :( the top notes are floral, which I liked. The middle was sweet which I LOVED. Almost smelled vanilla. Then the lasting and last smell is .... clean fresh and soapy? Like detergent. Iu2019m disappointed because I love musk and cedar wood! Ah well. If you like smelling like laundry detergent you may like this though!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is a really lovely soft floral musk that is perfect for every day wear. I am trying to incorporate more clean products into my routine and was happy to find a clean scent that I love! My only complaint is that I wish it had better lasting power - I can still smell it at the end of the day but only if I am directly smelling the areas I sprayed it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I accidentally sprayed the tester of this while in line at Sephora and instantly fell in love! Soo much so Iu2019m willing to buy the full size bottle.  This is a MUST have in my opinion.

reviews.review_title: Smells different than the sample,not in a good way
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this and loved it so much that I purchased two of the travel size (one for home and one to keep in my office desk). But the sprays that I received smell different than the sample did. Itu2019s missing that unique note that made me love the sample.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume , it has a very unique smell. It is light without being too sweet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume! I got it as a sample with my most recent Sephora order. I didnu2019t pick any samples this time because most of the time by the time my order gets shipped they run out of the samples I ordered anyway. I am so glad they threw this sample in there because it is my new favourite! The scent is light but still lasts throughout the day. I love that it is a clean product as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this so so much! Just feel yourself unique and special!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this scent (and the whole line!) - this smells fresh

I love this perfume. I got it as a sample when I ordered online and its one of my new favorites. Its very light and easy to wear. The only thing I dont like is that it doesnt last very long, but itu2019s still worth it because the scent is amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful, complex white musky scent. Usually white musk scents are too powdery and simple for me, but this scent keeps changing during the drydown and afterwards. It's true that lasting power is not great. But several sprays do last several hours. I will be purchasing a full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Guys, this might be the best smelling perfume I've ever tried. I am so obsessed, but must dock points because it fades so unbelievably fast. Which is surprising because it's not even an eau de toilette. If anyone from the company is reading this, please improve your formula!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very light pretty fragrance for everyday. It reminds me of a scented oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent so much that I bought a bottle for my home and a bottle for my office. Other people have pointed out that it doesn't last all day, but I think that's a fine trade off for now spraying chemicals all over my body. I love that it is a clean fragrance. And I also love the way it smells so much. I get compliments all the time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A gorgeous light fruity yet floral scent. One of my favorite perfumes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best scent for me, myself and I! There is something for familiar and poignant about it with a centering effect. Its also a perfect u201cprofessional smellu201d that is appropriated for the the office without the overly seductive enrichment of some other fantastical scents. Not to mention its a CLEAN brand. My best friend is very sensitive to perfumes and doesnu2019t wear them as she gets overwhelmed and headaches, BUT when i got into her car she loved it And asked what it was!  It passed a true litmus test with the most honest person I know!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It is nice, light and not overpowering.  I have issues with perfumes and prefer ones made from white flowers.   Calvin Klein Eternity is still my favourite but this is a nice alternative

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this scent! So divine! It lasts and it is not overpowering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample today and one of my Orders I sprayed a little on my wrist and ask my fiance to smell it he looked at me with bedroom eyes and I was sold. I really love the smell as well it actually is mysterious and classic at the same time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gross. Smells like windex, cheap and terrible both on and off the skin. Very strong but not in a good way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I do like this scent, although itu2019s not one of my favorites. It also has no lasting power on me whatsoever. I tried it a few times and ended up returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the smell but it doesnu2019t actually last long. I give it maybe an hour on you skin before itu2019s gone. It will last a little better of clothes but not by much.

reviews.review_title: Overpriced average perfume that fades quickly
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is not a bad perfume, but definitely not worth $100 for the larger bottle. It smells a little like Aqua Net hairspray for the first few minutes, then it smells nice for awhile and then poof it's gone in a couple of hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Based on the notes, this sounded like something Iu2019d love. Personally, it smells like scented hairspray. The first time I tried this I instantly thought of a beauty salon. It even has an almost burnt smell to mimic a hairspray beauty salon smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the clean smell of this perfume. The scent is beautiful, but not overbearing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of it in a sample bag and I sprayed a little. Shortly after it set, I fell in love with the scent. Itu2019s exactly what I have been looking for. A scent that is on the masculine side of feminine. As another review said itu2019s very unisex which is what Iu2019ve been looking for!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After trying this on a few, times I was sold. The scent is very delicate and light but still lingers through out the day. Iu2019m really happy with this purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful scent that doesnu2019t compare to any other. This lasts 8+ hours on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I don't write reviews unless something absolutely blows me away. I applied this perfume at about 6:30am before work. It is currently 5:15pm and I can still smell it! Probably the longest wearing perfume I have owned (which is an embarassing amount)haha. Amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: And I don't even like musk!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've always avoided musk scents as they smell like dirty laundry to me, but this one won me over. Forced by health concerns to give up my toxic products, I had been trying to expand my fragrance palate when I got a free sample of Myth. I put it on next to the sink, ready to scrub it off, but it is just GORGEOUS! It smells like clean skin, straight out of the shower after having used expensive soap: creamy, with just the slightest hint of sweetness from the coconut and a faint whiff of ocean air. As with most non-toxic fragrances, it doesn't have a ton of staying power on the skin, but it lasts longer on hair and clothes. I don't mind reapplying, though. It feels like a little shot of luxury and self-care throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve got a sample of this perfume with a previous purchase and immediately fell in love with the smell. Itu2019s so subtle and unique, Iu2019d give it a 10 stars! After a few days the sample was gone and I felt a strong need in this smell so I bought a full size bottle. Here comes a huge disappointment: it just doesnu2019t stay! I canu2019t feel it after an hour or two neither on my skin nor on my clothes. Not Iu2019m thinking about returning it after a week of use. Even though the smell is absolutely amazing, I donu2019t recommend spending $100 on something that doesnu2019t work as it should.
It is indeed a fresh smelling fragrance but it smells cheap given the price. Also itu2019s not a feminine fresh. I would prefer it if a guy wears it instead of a girl.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This scent has the prefect I only want myself to smell it vibe. It's soft, gentle and subtle, yet feminine like you just showered and reading a book in the garden. Age-wise I would say this is suitable for 20 - 40 , a very wide range.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample. This perfume smells heavenly!  I am very picky with perfumes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This smells like heaven!!!!  It does not last for long but I hate strong perfume anyways.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great musky. yet feminine scent - smells like musk with a bit of vanilla. Scent is quite long-lasting.  Dropping a star because like many of the other reviews say, it smells like straight up rubbing alcohol when you first put it on. The alcohol scent goes away within 30 seconds or so, but it's very strange. I almost tossed my sample in the trash when I first used it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING. I love this scent. Very clean. It smells musky at first, but when you spray it on, it transforms into a beautiful scent, and I AM ADDICTED.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is so sultry and delicious and sexy... I can't stop admiring it every moment I have it on. And I am not all that impressed with a lot of the fragrances I've sampled in the past year or so, the moment you smell it you think Wow, that's different... This is absolutely beautiful I must have a rollerball until I can save for the full bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample and immediately fell in love.  This beautiful scent is soft, warm and sexy.  I love that it is certified clean.  I will be purchasing this product today.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As a notorious perfume-hater, I didn't expect to love a scent this much. I was looking for something light, as I have a sensitive nose, and this was recommended to me by (who seemed to be) the Sephora manager on duty. Love, love, love this scent. It smells pretty, not too light and not too heavy, and doesn't overpower others around me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this scent. Has a freshness with layers of different notes that change as the hours wear on. Lasts most of the day or night, and helps fight the humid florida heat smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this scent - clean, soft, refreshing, not overpowering but I can pick it up all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: OMG, this is such a beautiful scent! It just smells quite lovely, and surrounds you in a cloud of well, loveliness! It evokes positive feelings and makes me feel happy. I only gave it 3 stars because it only lasted about 2 hours max and then there was no trace of it on my skin or clothes. Sorry, but for the price point, I expected a little more longevity. I had to return this one. I really wanted to love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very easy to wear soft floral musk. Very beautifully done jasmine notes. The floral aspect of this scent to my nose is more of a fresh and clean floral composition. Upon dry down the fragrance is notably reminiscent of a soapy fresh skin skin scent. Definitely very unisex. Perfect for people with sensitivity to strong smells.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this scent.  This was a I'll take a chance purchase and I'm glad I did.  The other reviewers are correct; the fragrance is definitely not long lasting.  This is a somewhat easy remedy - layer with the body milk.  Even with the quicker than I would like dissipation issue, I love the scent and it's definitely on the get this one again list.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: New favorite perfume!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i love the scent of this perfume. i blind bought the travel spray and ill most likely purchase the full size once i finish this. I collect perfumes and i've been reaching for this one every day. its a crowd pleaser- not offensive to anyone. This would be a great gift. My BF noticed this perfume instantly and he never says anything about any of my others unless i ask lol! lasting power is OK. not terrible but not great - i get about 6 hours of wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has been my go-to daytime scent for several months now. Itu2019s warm but not heavy at all and smells better as it wears. Iu2019m not usually a fan of floral scents but this one is an exception. It works in both warm and cool weather too. If I had to compare it to something Iu2019d say Glossier you or Chloe without the sharpness. I am super picky about scents and Iu2019m so glad I ran across this in my local Sephora because I probably wouldnu2019t have bought it otherwise.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The perfect fall/winter scent that Iu2019ll never get tired of. Wish it lasted a little longer like their rrose perfume which I can smell forever. I think I like every Ellis Brooklyn scent but this one is the best.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Recently I received a package with a sample size of Myth perfume inside. The package smelled spectacular, and I wondered why. Turns out the sample size bottle had shattered during transport. I was instantly hooked to the scent and bought the full-size bottle of perfume. The scent is beautiful; mature and very subtle. Like others said, the scent does not last all day, so I wouldnu2019t recommend this perfume if thatu2019s what youu2019re looking for. Iu2019d say this perfume is for a short event, a movie, maybe dinner, since the perfume will not overpower your palate.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I get compliments every time I wear this. I tend to love musky, woodsy masculine scents but they're a bit too overpowering on me - this one is softer without being too feminine. Love the citrusy, floral notes. It doesn't stay on my skin for as long as I'd like, but it does linger on my clothes. My new everyday scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: in love with this.  it is so unique.  femine, not ultra sweet or flowery, but very soft.  its perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells so good and can be worn any time of the year without feeling like itu2019s too floral for winter or too warm for springu2014while having essences of both. This is a very light, fresh floral that has a warmth to the floral that doesnu2019t come from any woods. Itu2019s not powdery, but it has a softness to it. Itu2019s just a very delicate, beautiful feminine scent that is very inoffensive while maintaining pretty decent wear time. Definitely wears longer than Jo Malone, Chloe and most Clean Reserve fragrances, but it doesnu2019t have the depth of a Burberry or Dior. I genuinely liked this scent and feel it would fill a gap in my extensive collection, Iu2019m just not sure I want to pay this much for such a soft fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this scent. I got a sample bottle and fell in love. I would honestly say itu2019s almost unisex because it reminds me of a guy, but itu2019s so nice that I want to wear it. Hmmmm, definitely want to buy it once it comes back in stock! Just a nice u201chome-y/ comfortableu201d scent to me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this when I was going out of town, thinking it smells good after trying it at my local store. I regret that decision, given that the smell only last for max (maybe) 5 minutes. Sadly over the course of 3 days I was completely out and didn't have any lasting fragrance on me. Personal opinion, waste of money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Received as a sample,ordered a travel size the next day,  like mentioned here before this scent goes on a bit awkwardly smelling but within minutes dries down to soft deliciousness. Every few years or so I find a scent I cant get enough of. This is one of those.

reviews.review_title: The best perfume for every day
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Literally my new go-to, every day perfume. I had a sample of this, and within 1 day of wearing it, I was hooked. Bonus points that it's a clean product. The scent isn't over powering so I don't end up sneezing like I do with some super strong perfumes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love the smell of this!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recently received this as a sample in my order, and I sprayed it on one wrist along with another scent on my other wrist. My first impression was - ICK - because it had a very strong alcohol scent, reminiscent of cheap drugstore perfume. But then the scent began to transform into this lovely floral, sort of woodsy scent. My boyfriend came home later and commented on how good I smelled, and after smelling each wrist he loved this scent far better than the other.
