I love changing scents based on my mood, the weather, etc., and I'm definitely adding this one to my arsenal. Don't be turned off by the initial alcohol smell.  Give it a few minutes and I think you'll be shocked how lovely it smells. I, too, find myself smelling my wrists throughout the day! :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I hate Jasmine, but I find myself loving it in this fragrance. Super sexy, but war and comfortable at the same time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this! The bottle is sleek and easy to keep in your purse (I also love that it's a spray bottle and not a rollerball). The smell is incredible- floral and a little spicy. Not too sweet, but feminine and super sexy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is like an elegant cashmere sweater.  It's smooth, has a sweetness (not overly), and is warm.  Love the travel size too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a truly beautiful scent. So why the one star? I received my Sehora order today and the bottle had leaked, leaving less than an inch in the bottle. I immediately contacted Sephora for a replacement, only to find that Sephora is sold out. I am getting a refund, but would much prefer the fragrance (which is obviously why I ordered it in the first place.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A clean, feminine and elegant perfume with decent staying power. In my opinion, a perfect scent for an older twenty-something who is looking for something a bit more refined smelling. Top notes for me are jasmine and musk. Very pleased that they have decided to offer MYTH in a travel sized vial now so that I can carry it with me when I leave the house. :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Sorry, Rrose, but Myth has become my new favorite! I don't know how to describe this other than my initial reaction which was, this is... LOVELY...

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is delightful! It's crisp at first, you get that alcohol/mom's perfume scent which turns citrusy within a few minutes on the skin. The dry down is really enchanting; you get more of the florals (jasmine) and eventually the musks which still retain an undefinable sweetness. I find this perfume addictive, enticing, and romantic--I can see why it's so highly rated! It's not super long lasting, like other's have said, and I find myself reapplying often and generously. However, I still really enjoy catching wisps of deliciousness as it fades. I do not recall seeing any reviews that said they received complements from other people on this scent, and I have not yet either. This makes me think it is more of a skin scent and doesn't project very far--which I'm perfectly fine with because I prefer subtle, intimate scents over loud ones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells lovely but despite it being eau de parfum, it has no staying power.  It lasted a couple of hours u2014 like any cologne.  Not worth the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Well....I struggled with giving this 3 stars.  And it SHOULD be only 2 1/2 stars really.  Hereu2019s why.  I LOVE this niche fragrance.  I adore it.  This scent is to die for.  Itu2019s heavenly.  Iu2019d give this 5+ stars in a heartbeat.....except for one very major problem:  the scent is weak and it just doesnu2019t last.  Within an hour or maybe two tops, the scent is gone.  Youu2019d have to spray about 20 spritzes to smell anything beyond a couple of hours.  Now, if perhaps youu2019re looking for something that is VERY close to your skin, something that you want nobody else to notice except perhaps yourself and maybe someone youu2019re being very u201ccloseu201d with, then this is for you.  But if youu2019d like your scent to be noticed at least SLIGHTLY by someone else, anyone else, then you should (sadly) take a pass on this one.  I loooove this fragrance.  But I canu2019t justify spending $100 on something that is gone in an hour.  I went through the mini spray bottle (.33 fluid oz.) in 3 days.  No joke.  Three days.  Because I had to keep spritzing it on me all day long.  Such a bummer.  If they can find a way to improve the silage and longevity, this would be my signature scent for LIFE.  Hands down.  For life.  And btw, using the body lotion with the eau de parfum doesnu2019t help either.  Tried that.  Didnu2019t work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this perfume!!! I simply cannot get enough of it.  Very clean smelling and I love the lotion that goes with it!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample and I think I might have to buy a whole bottle! Itu2019s a perfect balance of everything you want in a perfume and the dry down is long and lasting. Amazing, must try for absolutely anyone.
Love this! I'm super picky when it comes to fragrance, but this one is so addicting and wears well throughout the day. Not overwhelmingly sweet, with the perfect balance of musk vs freshness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this scent! It has to be my favorite perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Oh my gosh. I canu2019t get enough of this perfume. I love perfume but hate the overpowering perfumes but this one is so soft and subtle but doesnu2019t give up. You can get the smell all day. Itu2019s stunning and I am obsessed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered Chloe gift set, and received a sample Myth in the box.  I had never even heard of it, and w asnt even going to try it.  HUGE mistake!! I sprayed Myth on each wrist and was completely intrigued by this fragrance.  I am very picky!  I normally wear Chloe, Florabotanica, or Romance.  Myth is beautiful!! It is clean, sophisticated,  and unique!! Absolutely love it.  Will be purchasing VERY SOON!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow am I glad I got this sample .. I ordered it the next day after trying it out. I can't put my finger on it because this isn't my typical fragrance type but it is absolutely beautiful. It is feminine, classy.. yet relaxed, it smells clean but in a warm way. In my opinion this scent would be suitable for everyday, any time of year , for the office or for a date. I have owned many perfumes and very rarely am I so impressed or feel like I have to have a perfume but this one did it for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love all 6 perfumes from Ellis, Myth, Sci-Fi, and Raven are my favorite ones!
Myth is truly one of a kind scent and lasts so long. There is a scent for everyone in this collection! LOVE Ellis Brooklyn products!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful modern take on femininity. Very romantic with a super soft hint of sexy (if at all), but not at all naughty sexy.  In fact, if I could describe this in two words, it'd be lazy romantic (in a good way) -- makes me think of an intimate date or lounging in bed with a lover, both of which would be romantic and sensual, not wildly sexual. I love the way all the scents come about, from beginning to end. Unfortunately, I'm unable to keep it as it's quite headache-inducing even with only 1 spray to the wrist. Very sad bc everything else about is so nice (packaging is sleek!). Sillage and longevity were both 3/5 for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I want it all for myself!! I absolutely adore this scent I've been on the hunt for a signature fragrance and after almost a year of searching and trying samples. This is the one. For reference I'm 21 and I love citrusy yet sexy ~different~ scents this is all of the above without aging you. I find it hard for fragrances to last on me this last almost 6hours on me which is more than perfect!

I found this fragrance as I was wandering through the fragrance section during the last Rouge event. I loved how modern, yet feminine, it is, and asked for a sample. I wore that sample to death, and then ordered the full size. I never buy full sized fragrances anymore because I never finish a bottle, but this one I'm sure I will. It's so soft and floral, but also warm and musky. It lasts all day, and I love the unexpected and spontaneous whiffs I get throughout the day. Definitely my new fav.

I am a perfume addict so I find it hard to find something I haven't smelled before. This fragrance is very different. It's Woodsy, citrusy, green and floral all in one. Great for summer or everyday. It has great lasting length too. For reference I like Black Orchid by Tom Ford, Carven, Elizabeth James Nirvana Rose or Neroli Portofino by Tom Ford. This is really nice, sexy and sophisticated like the description.
This scent smells fantastic! It is soft and sophisticated. Not overpowering.

reviews.review_title: Soft and Subtle for the Modern Woman
reviews.review_text: For the modern day woman, who needs to feel fresh, light, and in balance, and who craves a soft and insidious fragrance to surround her as she conquers the day, this scent is sublime. It is beautiful and elegant, yet subdued and understated. It stays with me throughout the day with an intrinsic calm. I highly recommend MYTH by Ellis Brooklyn for everyday femininity...
I bought this after reading the reviews - it had all the notes I love. At first smell I wasn't sure, but now after a few days I can't get enough!!
I received this a week or so ago and adore it! The top notes are very citrusy but it mellows out and becomes very warm and almost spicy. I'm so happy I took a chance on this unique fragrance!

I consider myself a bit of a smell snob and I just bought and already adore MYTH! It is layered, complex yet light and completely alluring. I am already wearing it daily and happy to have found something so beautiful and unique.
Iu2019m loving my new perfume! Myth smells so good. Itu2019s strong enough but not overpowering. Itu2019s definitely being added to the rotation.

I got a sample of this fragrance and immediately fell in love. It's warm, sophisticated, and feminine yet not overpowering or headache-inducing like I find most perfumes to be. I can't stop smelling my wrist- I can't get enough of it! It's addicting! I'll be wearing this throughout fall and winter.
